Html: I need to show a large ammount of data using the D3, and I would know how do the filters work, because I guess it can help me

Hi,

filters are simple classes that filter some lists (currently they are lists, but in future they can become IEnumerable<Point>). By default filters are enabled for LineChart, so the only thing that can help you to increase performance is to create some new filter class and to add it to lineGraph.Filters.

Best regards,

Mikhail.
